effect_text: +2 Charisma. If this Queen's base Nerve is 6 or more, also +1 Nerve.
flavor_text: So tall, it's giving 'weather report from the heavens'.

effect_text: +2 Talent. During a Lip Sync, if the category is Uniqueness, gain +1 to the Performance Score.
flavor_text: Is she naked? Is she dripping in jewels? Yes.

effect_text: +1 Talent. If this Queen wins a Lip Sync based on Talent, the opponent's Queen gets 1 Shade Token.
+2 Nerve. This Queen can hold 4 Shade Tokens before being Read for Filth.
flavor_text: The body is HERE... and impeccably sculpted.

effect_text: Activate during your Werk Room Phase: Pay 1 Gag Token. Draw 1 card.
flavor_text: *Thworp!* The library is open, and so is your hand.

effect_text: +1 Uniqueness. Once per game, prevent 1 Shade Token from being placed on this Queen.
+3 Nerve. Opponent's abilities cannot reduce this Queen's Nerve stat.
flavor_text: It's not just jewelry, it's an armor of audacity.

effect_text: +1 Charisma, +1 Uniqueness. When this card is played, you may remove 1 Shade Token from this Queen.
flavor_text: When in doubt, glitter it out.

effect_text: +1 Charisma. If the Lip Sync category is Charisma, gain an additional +1 Performance Score.
flavor_text: Sharp, chic, and ready to read.

effect_text: +3 Uniqueness. Opponent cannot play Prop accessories on their Queen during their next turn.
